scripts.test:ci: npm run test:ci:backend && npm run test:ci:frontend
scripts.test:ci:frontend: cd frontend && npm run lint && npm run test:unit:ci && npm run test:coverage && npm run type-check && npm run build
scripts.test:ci:backend: dotnet clean backend/BidCalculationTool.sln && dotnet restore backend/BidCalculationTool.sln && dotnet build backend/BidCalculationTool.sln --no-restore && dotnet test backend/BidCalculationTool.sln --no-build --verbosity normal --collect:"XPlat Code Coverage"
scripts.setup: cd frontend && npm install && cd .. && dotnet restore backend/BidCalculationTool.sln
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/node_modules frontend/dist && rm -rf backend/*/bin backend/*/obj && rm -rf backend/*/*/bin backend/*/*/obj
